issue.title: [CF 181] New sound event: alpha change
issue.body:
Add a sound event that will trigger whenever the alpha changes past/to a certain amount. Use a logical operator and an alpha level to specify when it will trigger.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #181 | Raw

comments.body:
On second thought, no. The only purpose would be to use it in conjunction with stack/duration settings or conditions, in which case you could just create another icon and set it to always hide.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
